channel.title: Ohgosh! Godswords :o
channel.description: Ok, here's the deal. I finally found out how to add some godswords and other "silab" items... woohoo. Now, when i try to pick it up, it gives me the basic pickup error (use as ::pickup 0995 500 etc) so, i tried ::item 13555. yay! a AGS... but when i pick it up, it gives me this stupid boots, and it does that with all the "silab" items i've added... :confused: aaargh! why? and how can i solve it? Hope you guys can help me out. - Dwarf, Owner and hoster of DwarfScape PK V2.

item.title: Ohgosh! Godswords :o
item.dc:creator: @Dwarf2000 Dwarf2000
item.description:
@Dwarf2000 wrote:

the 1533 was a typing mistake, i meant 15333.
Anyway, i’ve made a video so you can see what’s the problem…
i know, quality sucks, but you’re able to see the problem:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3gl97fqy7b4

Read full topic

item.title: Ohgosh! Godswords :o

item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

^ What He Said ^

Read full topic

item.title: Ohgosh! Godswords :o
item.dc:creator: @I_Uk_0wn4g3_I I Uk 0wn4g3 I
item.description:
@I_Uk_0wn4g3_I wrote:

Because its the wrong ITEM ID.

item = 15333 Armadyl_Godsword A_beautiful,_heavy_sword. 30000 50000000 30000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 8 item = 15334 Bandos_Godsword A_brutally_heavy_sword. 30000 80000000 30000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 8 item = 15335 Saradomin_Godsword A_gracious,_heavy_sword. 30000 45000000 30000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 8 item = 15336 Zamorak_Godsword A_terrifying,_heavy_sword. 30000 50000000 30000 0 132 80 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 132 8
now compile, in game you type ::pickup 15333 1 or ::item 15333 1 depending on your command… 15333 is item ID “1” is the amount

Read full topic

item.title: Ohgosh! Godswords :o
item.dc:creator: @Dwarf2000 Dwarf2000
item.description:
@Dwarf2000 wrote:

Ok, here’s the deal. I finally found out how to add some godswords and other “silab” items… woohoo.
Now, when i try to pick it up, it gives me the basic pickup error (use as ::pickup 0995 500 etc)
so, i tried ::item 13555.
yay! a AGS… but when i pick it up, it gives me this stupid boots, and it does that with all the “silab” items i’ve added… aaargh! why? and how can i solve it?
Hope you guys can help me out.

  • Dwarf, Owner and hoster of DwarfScape PK V2.

Read full topic
